task.title: Excluding multiple tenant volumes from a backup

taskbody.context: By default, stores application data in /opt/serviced/var/volumes. The directory can be changed by specifying the SERVICED_VOLUMES_PATH environment variable in the configuration file, /etc/default/serviced. If necessary, replace /opt/serviced/var/volumes with your path.

step.cmd: Log in to the master host .
Display the directories under the tenant identifier.
step.info: Replace Tenant-ID with the identifier displayed in the previous step.ls /opt/serviced/var/volumes/Tenant-ID

step.cmd: Exclude multiple tenant volumes from the backup.
step.info: For example, mariadb-events and zeneventserver. Replace Tenant-ID with your tenant identifier.serviced backup /opt/serviced/var/backups \ --exclude /opt/serviced/var/volumes/Tenant-ID/mariadb-events \ --exclude opt/serviced/var/volumes/Tenant-ID/zeneventserver
